title: How To Completely Replace Your Laptop With An iPad Mini
text:
Thanks to the upcoming release of iPadOS, the iPad is one step closer to becoming a viable laptop replacement for most people.

I’ve been playing around with the iPadOS beta on my iPad Mini for the past few weeks. During my testing, I tried to figure out what it would take for the average user to completely replace their laptop with an iPad. The good news is, thanks to some new features, the iPad is more versatile than it’s ever been.

The bad news is, there are still some hoops to jump through. Watch the video above to find out how to turn your humble iPad into a viable laptop replacement.
